book.title: Microbiome marker gene analysis with QIIME 2

books.title: Using QIIME 2
books.description: Your guide to becoming a QIIME 2 Framework power user.

books.title: Developing with QIIME 2
books.description: Your guide for writing, testing, and distributing QIIME 2 plugins, interfaces, and documentation.

tutorials.title: QIIME 2 Cancer Microbiome Intervention Tutorial
tutorials.description: This tutorial was originally developed for the 2022 NIH Foundation for Advanced Education in the Sciences Microbiome Bioinformatics with QIIME 2 workshop, taught online January 31 - February 4, 2022.

tutorials.title: Arbuscular Mycorrhizal Fungi (AMF) Analysis Tutorial
tutorials.description: This tutorial is based on a Northern Arizona University Course taught by Professors Manju M. Gupta, Nancy Johnson and Catherine Gehring. This tutorial was developed by the QIIME 2 Team and Dr. Manju M. Gupta to illustrate a common AMF QIIME 2 workflow
